name: AI Media Studio by Paradiso
author: Paradiso AI

sections.description:
Paradiso AI platform is an online application that lets users easily create text, images, and videos with a human-like spokesperson, human-sounding voice-overs and translations in over 75 languages. You can use it to create articles, generate YouTube videos, translate your eLearning course into different languages, or create internal communication videos with a human like spokesperson. The possibilities are endless. You can get started for free and generate content using Paradiso AI Media Studio Plugin.

Paradiso AI is used by 1000s of marketers, creators, news organizations, public communications departments and educators worldwide.

Get started for free now!
Official website

Support : https://www.paradiso.ai/contact-us/
Terms Of Use : https://www.paradiso.ai/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy : https://www.paradiso.ai/privacy-policy/

Install for free now!

Features

* Explore the AI Platform for a variety of tools to Create engaging content with app.paradiso.ai:  
* Paradiso AI tools: 

    1. AI video generator  
    2. AI text generator  
    3. AI image generator  
    4. AI voice-over generator  
    5. AI translator 
    6. Screen recording 
    7. AI video editor 

* Create templates for everything you do, from content creation to internal communication videos. 
* Create high-quality content in over 50 languages, making it easy to expand your reach and connect with diverse audiences worldwide  
* Utilize the internal API to integrate Paradiso AI Media Studio into your applications and create customized solutions. 
* Understand with ease with the multilingual feature 

    1. 12 Languages for Live Transcribe for Speech to Text 
    2. +144 Languages and Dialects for Text to Speech 
    3. +170 Languages & Dialects for Speech to Text 

* Create audio files with any document file 

    1. 900+ Different voices and accents 
    2. Mix up to 20 voices in a single text synthesize task 
    3. Multiple voice combinations for standard & neural voices
  • Stay tuned for upcoming features that will enhance your content creation experience even further.
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract plugin files to a wp-content/plugin directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the WordPress admin interface.
  3. Done !
sections.faq:
What if I am not a technical person?

Even if you’re not tech-savvy, you can still use Paradiso AI Media Studio. It is designed to be user-friendly with no need for special skills or a steep learning curve.

Is Paradiso AI Media Studio plugin compatible with Mac and PC?

Absolutely! It runs directly in your internet browser, so you can use it on any computer with an internet connection. There’s no need to install anything or worry about updates.

What types of media can I create with Paradiso AI Media Studio?

You can use the software to create videos, podcasts, and other types of content.

How many types of document format does it support?

  1. Support for documents in following formats:

    Plain Text (.txt) 
HTML 
Word Documents (.docx) 
PowerPoint Presentation Files (.pptx) 
Excel Workbook Files (.xlsx) 
XLIFF Files (.xlf v1.2)

How many Voiceover can you create?

Paradiso AI Media Studio has 900 voices from Standard to Neural.

Are there any limitations on the amount of content I can create with the software? 

There may be limitations on the amount of content you can create depending on your subscription plan.

Do you support multiple domains?

Yes we do! Although the free plan supports only a single domain, the paid plans support multiple domains to be integrated to the service. Check out our pricing page to learn more

Can I use the plugin with any WordPress theme?

Yes, the plugin is designed to be compatible with any WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added new AI feature
  • Improved SSO code

1.0.0

  • First Release
